## NonRelationalFields type

Currently this omits any object-type fields. Update this when we add custom types/enums.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type NonRelationalFields<M extends Model> = {
    [Field in keyof M as UnwrapArray<M[Field]> extends Record<string, unknown> ? never : Field]: M[Field];
};
```
**References:** [Model](./data-schema-types.model.md)<!-- -->, [UnwrapArray](./data-schema-types.unwraparray.md)
